channel.title: Source help plz
channel.description: i have a client and i need a source to play it on.Silabsoft i dont like the graphics and i see eveyine that has there's posted has the HD game and i wanted to know how they got it....plz help...if i get it and the game works ill make all admin or mods and co-owners
